sentences.sContent: The government started to denationalize financial institutions.
sentences.sCn: 政府开始将金融机构私有化。

remMethod.val: de(表加强) + nationalize(使…国有化) → 使非国有化

words.tran: 剥夺国籍；剥夺公民权利；非国有化
剥夺……的国民权利；使……恢复为私营；开除……的国籍

trans.tranCn: 私营化， 使非国有化， 去国有化； 开除…国籍
trans.tranOther: to sell a business or industry that is owned by the state, so that it is then owned privately
